name: frontenddevroadmap
description: Exercises and projects for learning frontend development fundamentals and workflow.

scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md package.json && git commit -m "chore(release): bump version and update changelog" && npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md package.json && git commit -m "chore(release): bump version and update changelog" && npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md package.json && git commit -m "chore(release): bump version and update changelog" && npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push && git push --tags
